business_details.Business: Sentenced the convict Alom Sheikh and Atinur Rahman to undergo rigorous imprisonment for three months and to pay a fine of Rs.1000/- only each in default to undergo rigorous imprisonment for fifteen days each, for committing the offence under Section 323, read with 34 IPC and to undergo rigorous imprisonment for five years each and to pay a fine of Rs.10000/- only default to undergo rigorous imprisonment for six months each, for committing the offence under section 8 of the POCSO Act
